title: Help with proxifier
body:
Hi we just transfer to a unit without internet or wifi so currently is use Psiphon on my android mobile and thetered it to my pc so i can have internet connection. Using proxifier i was able to get pass to patcher but cannot pass to log in server. I already use your-freedom and it doesnt help. I am no computer expert nor native english speaker.

Note: I can pass through log in server if I use data plan but currently I dont have it. Since I can get this far without it is there a method that will let me pass log in server and pvp.net

replies.body: What error are you getting? Could you screen-shot it and attach it to the thread?
